----------------- GetChains ----------------------
SELECT c.id               , c.name          FROM tbl_chains c   WHERE c.isd = '0'    UNION               SELECT 0, 'ВСЕ СЕТИ' 
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetChains ----------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (8 = p.chain_id        OR 8 = 0)           
##########  4,0003 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 8 = p.chain_id              OR 8 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  227,013 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 8 = p.chain_id              OR 8 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  257,0147 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 8 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  515,0295 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (10 = p.chain_id        OR 10 = 0)           
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 10 = p.chain_id              OR 10 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  219,0125 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 10 = p.chain_id              OR 10 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 10 = p.chain_id              OR 10 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  281,0161 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 10 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  483,0276 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (11 = p.chain_id        OR 11 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 11 = p.chain_id              OR 11 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  343,0196 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 11 = p.chain_id              OR 11 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 11 = p.chain_id              OR 11 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  357,0204 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 11 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  464,0266 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (13 = p.chain_id        OR 13 = 0)           
##########  4,0003 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 13 = p.chain_id              OR 13 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  244,014 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 13 = p.chain_id              OR 13 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 13 = p.chain_id              OR 13 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  303,0174 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 13 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  484,0277 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (14 = p.chain_id        OR 14 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 14 = p.chain_id              OR 14 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  336,0192 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 14 = p.chain_id              OR 14 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 14 = p.chain_id              OR 14 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  420,024 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 14 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  466,0267 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (15 = p.chain_id        OR 15 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 15 = p.chain_id              OR 15 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  272,0156 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 15 = p.chain_id              OR 15 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 15 = p.chain_id              OR 15 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  342,0196 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 15 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  511,0292 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (17 = p.chain_id        OR 17 = 0)           
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 17 = p.chain_id              OR 17 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  210,0121 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 17 = p.chain_id              OR 17 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 17 = p.chain_id              OR 17 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  271,0155 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 17 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  476,0272 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (18 = p.chain_id        OR 18 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 18 = p.chain_id              OR 18 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  351,0201 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 18 = p.chain_id              OR 18 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 18 = p.chain_id              OR 18 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  367,021 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 18 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  471,0269 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (19 = p.chain_id        OR 19 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 19 = p.chain_id              OR 19 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  250,0143 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 19 = p.chain_id              OR 19 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 19 = p.chain_id              OR 19 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  286,0164 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 19 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  508,0291 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (20 = p.chain_id        OR 20 = 0)           
##########  2,0002 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 20 = p.chain_id              OR 20 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  350,02 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 20 = p.chain_id              OR 20 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 20 = p.chain_id              OR 20 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  359,0205 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 20 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  464,0265 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (21 = p.chain_id        OR 21 = 0)           
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 21 = p.chain_id              OR 21 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 21 = p.chain_id              OR 21 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 21 = p.chain_id              OR 21 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  434,0248 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 21 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  472,027 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (22 = p.chain_id        OR 22 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 22 = p.chain_id              OR 22 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  349,02 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 22 = p.chain_id              OR 22 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 22 = p.chain_id              OR 22 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  395,0226 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 22 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  480,0275 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (23 = p.chain_id        OR 23 = 0)           
##########  2,0002 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  306,0175 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 23 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  498,0285 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (24 = p.chain_id        OR 24 = 0)           
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  402,023 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 24 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  466,0266 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (25 = p.chain_id        OR 25 = 0)           
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.id) AS p_d 			            LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id
